name: CreateDashboardTemplate
description:
Create a new dashboard template in a Datadog project.

This tool allows you to create a new dashboard template within a specified Datadog project. Use it when you need to set up a new dashboard template using the project's ID.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Datadog project where you want to create the dashboard template. Obtain it by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: dashboard_template_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details about the dashboard template such as id, template_name, description, filters, tags, tiles, variables, and other relevant data.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
